snippet: Black nail polish is no longer just for angsty teenagers making their cosmetics purchases on late-night trips to Duane Reade.
abstract: Black nail polish is no longer just for angsty teenagers making their cosmetics purchases on late-night trips to Duane Reade.
lead_paragraph: Black nail polish is no longer just for angsty teenagers making their cosmetics purchases on late-night trips to Duane Reade. There has been a resurgence of the dark nail on the runways, including those of Cushnie et Ochs, Chanel and Rag & Bone, to name a few. And to disprove the idea that there can't be more than one shade of black comes the Dickensian Volume, a set of 10 deceivingly dark and metallic shades by the indie nail polish line StrangeBeautiful. Its creator, the designer-turned-beauty-entrepreneur Jane Schub, drew inspiration from Charles Dickens and the Brothers Grimm. Wear a different polish on each nail for the full effect.
